user_input: Please create hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for the TYNDP 2026 Scenarios. Use the 'NT', 'NT_HE' and 'NT_LE' Scenarios. Use the year 2030, 2035, 2040 and 2050. Split the nodes. Convert to tst format. No need to access any PLEXOS database for now
author: DAG-Builder
default_llm_context: Generate hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios (NT, NT_HE, NT_LE) and years 2030, 2035, 2040, 2050. Split nodes as requested and export outputs to TST format. Do not access any PLEXOS database.

function_args.user_input: Create hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050. Split the nodes. Do not access any PLEXOS database.

tasks.description: Create hourly Hydrogen demand profiles for TYNDP 2026 scenarios 'NT', 'NT_HE', and 'NT_LE' for years 2030, 2035, 2040, and 2050, and split the nodes.
tasks.entity_selection_context: From the user's request, resolve scenarios ['NT','NT_HE','NT_LE'], years [2030, 2035, 2040, 2050], and enable node splitting. No PLEXOS database access is required.

tasks.description: Export the generated hourly Hydrogen demand profiles to the TST (TYNDP study team) standard format.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Use outputs from 'main_demand_processer_v2' to build TST workbooks covering all specified scenarios and years.
